title: Five cover-ups for autumn that work in the 'in-between' seasons
text:
Autumn has well and truly arrived this week, although the comforting crackle of russet leaves underfoot has been replaced by lashing rain and dank drizzle. But it also sparked a watercooler debate on cover-ups, of the far more everyday kind rather than presidential allegations involving phone recordings.

It’s not yet cold enough for the ceremonial Putting On Of The Big Coat, but you need something with substance. Happily, menswear’s become more experimental in this respect, tinkering with traditional formats to create ‘in-between’ cover-ups that work that little bit harder.

Work jacket
